name: Mech Warrior
description: "Mech Warriors" is a 3D shooting game with top-down angle. In the distant future from now, alien creatures have invaded the earth. After humans are defeated, some of the surviving humans realized that "the flesh and blood are weak", and decisively abandoned the human body, uploaded their consciousness to the mecha, and completed the "mechanical ascension". These "people" who became mechs, called "Mech Warriors", walking among the ruins of the city, slaughtering monsters, and trying to survive with the belief of rebuilding the earth.
